document.full_text: the european union is looking to lower interest rates on bailout loans to greece and ireland and is working on a second rescue for athens in an effort to prevent a disorderly debt restructuring.
document.title: eu eyes lower rates for greece, ireland amid chaos
lines_and_colors: the european union is looking to lower interest rates on bailout loans to greece and ireland and is working on a second rescue for athens in an effort to prevent a disorderly debt restructuring.
